name: ShellSwapped
description:
Clawdette has outgrown her shell.  Can you navigate the complex market of hermit crab bartering and trade up to a nice, new (used) shell?

Made in a month for Buddy Jam 2!

The game is full and complete, although we liked the result enough that we might extend it into a fuller game in the future (which'll probably include linux and mac builds, but we didn't have time for this one)!
